attributes.action: Legalise the recreational use of cannabis for age 18+
attributes.additional_details: As scientist have discovered cannabis helps with stress, depression and even seizures. We the public would like to choose the legalisation of cannabis.
attributes.background: As we see in other countries such as America, Canada and etc. The legalisation of cannabis would reduce crime rate and reduce racial discrimination towards African English people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551846
